articles.author: Fiona Jackson
articles.title: The Last of Us zombie infection is REAL - and could infect humans, experts warn - Daily Mail
articles.description: Dr Henrik de Fine Licht, a professor at the University of Copenhagen, has deemed the idea of a similar fungus evolving to be able to infect humans as 'not too far-fetched'.
articles.content:
If you've been watching the new zombie series 'The Last of Us', you may have thought you were safe with the knowledge that it was all fictional.
